vecUnachieved.strDescription: Kill an enemy with an exploding barrel.
Kill an enemy, knifing them with a gun blade.

vecUnachieved.strName: Vaulting Your Way To The Top

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Win a live grenade at a Slot Machine.
Equip purple-rated gear or better in every slot.

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/397540/extras/banner.jpg?t=1727721981[/img]
The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and an all-new mayhem-fueled adventure! Blast through new worlds and enemies as one of four brand new Vault Hunters – the ultimate treasure-seeking badasses of the Borderlands, each with deep skill trees, abilities, and customization. Play solo or join with friends to take on insane enemies, score loads of loot and save your home from the most ruthless cult leaders in the galaxy.
[h2]A MAYHEM-FUELED THRILL RIDE [/h2]
Stop the fanatical Calypso Twins from uniting the bandit clans and claiming the galaxy’s ultimate power. Only you, a thrill-seeking Vault Hunter, have the arsenal and allies to take them down.[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/397540/extras/CharBanner.gif?t=1727721981[/img]
[h2]YOUR VAULT HUNTER, YOUR PLAYSTYLE [/h2]
Become one of four extraordinary Vault Hunters, each with unique abilities, playstyles, deep skill trees, and tons of personalization options. All Vault Hunters are capable of awesome mayhem alone, but together they are unstoppable.
[h2]LOCK, LOAD, AND LOOT[/h2]
With bazillions of guns and gadgets, every fight is an opportunity to score new gear. Firearms with self-propelling bullet shields? Check. Rifles that spawn fire-spewing volcanoes? Obviously. Guns that grow legs and chase down enemies while hurling verbal insults? Yeah, got that too.[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/397540/extras/Chest.gif?t=1727721981[/img]
[h2]NEW BORDERLANDS [/h2]
Discover new worlds beyond Pandora, each featuring unique environments to explore and enemies to destroy. Tear through hostile deserts, battle your way across war-torn cityscapes, navigate deadly bayous, and more![img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/397540/extras/cast.gif?t=1727721981[/img]
[h2]QUICK & SEAMLESS CO-OP ACTION[/h2]
Play with anyone at any time with online co-op, regardless of your level or mission progress.
data.strSnippet: The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and a mayhem-fueled adventure! Blast through new worlds and enemies as one of four new Vault Hunters.
